section.section: Except as permitted under subsection (b) of this section, a corporation may be a professional corporation under § 5-112 of this subtitle solely for the purpose of rendering professional services within a single profession.

Except as provided in paragraph (3) of this subsection, a corporation that is eligible to be a professional corporation under this subtitle may not organize under any other corporate form permitted by this article.

text.section: A corporation may be a professional corporation under § 5-112 of this subtitle for the purpose of rendering the same, similar, or related professional services within 2 or more professions.
